Immigration Detention Abolition

Angelica Frausto (Nerdy Brown Kid)

About the Artist

Angelica Frausto, known as 'Nerdy Brown Kid,' is a Xicana artist and social scientist. Her work is deeply rooted in the experiences of women of color and immigrants, often serving as visual advocacy for the abolition of immigration detention.

The Work

Her illustrations are often used in campaigns for organizations like the Detention Watch Network. They focus on the humanity, dreams, and resilience of those impacted by the immigration system, countering dehumanizing political narratives.
